001package com.deploygate.service;
002
003public interface DeployGateEvent {
004    // old format is too ambiguous so we are going to make it clear and safer.
005    //
006    // all values should be <namespace>.<content> since writing this comment :)
007    //
008    // namespace:
009    //   ACTION => a
010    //   EXTRA => e
011    //
012    // content:
013    //   should be hyphen-separated string and be lower cases
014
015    public static final String ACTION_INIT = "init";
016    public static final String ACTION_UPDATE_AVAILABLE = "update";
017    public static final String ACTION_ENABLE_LOGCAT = "enableLogcat";
018    public static final String ACTION_DISABLE_LOGCAT = "disableLogcat";
019    public static final String ACTION_ONESHOT_LOGCAT = "oneshotLogcat";
020
021    public static final String ACTION_SEND_LOGCAT = "sendLogcat";
022    public static final String ACTION_SEND_CRASH_REPORT = "reportCrash";
023    public static final String ACTION_SEND_CUSTOM_LOG = "customLog";
024    public static final String ACTION_INSTALL_UPDATE = "installUpdate";
025    public static final String ACTION_OPEN_APP_DETAIL = "openAppDetail";
026    public static final String ACTION_OPEN_COMMENTS = "openComments";
027    public static final String ACTION_COMPOSE_COMMENT = "composeComment";
028    public static final String ACTION_VISIBILITY_EVENT = "a.visibility-event";
029
030    public static final String EXTRA_AUTHOR = "author";
031    public static final String EXTRA_EXPECTED_AUTHOR = "expectedAuthor";
032    public static final String EXTRA_SDK_VERSION = "sdkVersion";
033    public static final String EXTRA_IS_MANAGED = "isManaged";
034    public static final String EXTRA_IS_AUTHORIZED = "isAuthorized";
035    public static final String EXTRA_LOGIN_USERNAME = "loginUsername";
036    public static final String EXTRA_IS_STOP_REQUESTED = "isStopRequested";
037    public static final String EXTRA_SERIAL = "serial";
038    public static final String EXTRA_VERSION_NAME = "versionName";
039    public static final String EXTRA_VERSION_CODE = "versionCode";
040    public static final String EXTRA_SERIAL_MESSAGE = "serialMessage";
041    public static final String EXTRA_CAN_LOGCAT = "canLogCat";
042    public static final String EXTRA_IS_BOOT = "isBoot";
043    public static final String EXTRA_LOG = "log";
044    public static final String EXTRA_LOG_TYPE = "logType";
045
046    /**
047     * the unique id generated on the client side to identify data
048     */
049    public static final String EXTRA_CID = "e.cid";
050
051    /**
052     * a group id that collects instructions
053     */
054    public static final String EXTRA_INSTRUCTION_GROUP_ID = "e.gid";
055
056    /**
057     * session key of a logcat-stream
058     */
059    public static final String EXTRA_LOGCAT_STREAM_SESSION_KEY = "e.logcat-stream-session-key";
060
061    /**
062     * a marker of the bundle positioning
063     */
064    public static final String EXTRA_BUNDLE_POSITION = "e.bundle-position";
065
066    /**
067     * buffered-at in sdk-side, depends on device-clock.
068     */
069    public static final String EXTRA_BUFFERED_AT_IN_MILLI_SECONDS = "e.bufferedAt";
070
071    /**
072     * this key shouldn't be used. ref: com.deploygate.sdk.Compatibility#SERIALIZED_EXCEPTION
073     */
074    @Deprecated
075    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION = "exception";
076    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION_ROOT_CAUSE_CLASSNAME = "exceptionRootCauseClassName";
077    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION_ROOT_CAUSE_MESSAGE = "exceptionRootCauseMessage";
078    public static final String EXTRA_EXCEPTION_STACKTRACES = "exceptionStackTraces";
079    public static final String EXTRA_CURRENT_REVISION = "currentRevision";
080    public static final String EXTRA_CURRENT_DISTRIBUTION_ID = "currentDistributionId";
081    public static final String EXTRA_CURRENT_DISTRIBUTION_TITLE = "currentDistributionTitle";
082    /**
083     * this key shouldn't be used
084     */
085    @Deprecated
086    public static final String EXTRA_DEPLOYGATE_VERSION_CODE = "deploygateVersionCode";
087    public static final String EXTRA_COMMENT = "comment";
088    public static final String EXTRA_DISTRIBUTION_USER_NAME = "distributionUserName";
089
090    /**
091     * the id of the capture.
092     */
093    public static final String EXTRA_CAPTURE_ID = "e.capture-id";
094
095    /**
096     * A event type for the app goes to foreground/background.
097     */
098    public static final String EXTRA_VISIBILITY_EVENT_TYPE = "e.visibility-event-type";
099
100    /**
101     * The elapsed real time since boot at the time when the app goes to foreground/background.
102     * this value must be nano times.
103     */
104    public static final String EXTRA_VISIBILITY_EVENT_ELAPSED_REAL_TIME_IN_NANOS = "e.visibility-event-elapsed-real-time";
105
106    interface VisibilityType {
107        int BACKGROUND = 0;
108        int FOREGROUND = 1;
109    }
110}
